# Required packages

> Insert in the lower chunk the packages you will need

```{r}
rm(list = ls()) 
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
library(RSQLite)
library(DBI)
```

# Data

```{r}
db <- DBI::dbConnect(SQLite(), "database.sqlite", extended_types = T)
dbListTables(db)
```

# Data Processing

```{r}
tbl(db, "election_data") %>% 
  head(n = 50)
```
